alert.note: Alert for Brown; Day; Marshall (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:34PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Day, southwestern Marshall and east central Brown Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 233 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Putney, or 10 miles north of Groton, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Putney around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tacoma Park and Columbia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
